Text: Can't thank you enough. You're the soundtrack king.
Now if only someone could get a good torrent of the movie itself up...sigh
In my 50-some years, I have never been so excited about seeing a new film.  This album will have to tide me over until the film opens in Europe.  Many, many thanks!
@Danny91 This is a film that needs to be seen in a theater. I would gladly pay to watch this again.
Now this is how excited about seeing this movie. It aint out in my country or on the net but i'm already downloading the OST! Amazing! Thanks!
Thanks for this great music.  I agree this film must be seen in a cinema, and I'm planning to see it for the second time soon.
Don't understand why people keep insisting that this needs to be seen in a theater. The quality of most movie theater projections sucks, frankly. This is a film that needs to be seen on Blu Ray!
there a good one out now, thinks it extremezone
